Class Server.SockServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.SockServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Server

    private class Server.SockServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This new Inner Class implements Runnable and objects instantiated from this class will become server threads each serving a different client

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Set up steams, add user and send back it's channels. Listen for messages and respond to them as necessary until client is terminated.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • waitForConnection

        private void waitForConnection()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Waits for a connection to be made and sets up the new socket pair
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection is interrupted

      • processConnection

        private void processConnection()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Listens for output from the user connected to this socket. Dispatches messages dependent on the message received.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection fails

      • addChannel

        private void addChannel(java.lang.String channel,
                        java.lang.String[] users)
        Adds to the file mapping clients to users a new channel with the specified users
        Parameters:
        channel - new channel name
        users - array of users to be added

      • addMessage

        private void addMessage(java.lang.String channel,
                        java.lang.String user,
                        java.lang.String message)
        To the specified channel, write that the user sent the message in the channel log file.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel the message was sent on
        user - the user who sent the message
        message - the message that was sent

      • getConversationHistory

        private java.lang.String getConversationHistory(java.lang.String channel)
        Searches for the specified channel and returns as a String the entire log of all messages ever sent in it.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel being searched
        Returns:
        the entire message log

      • addChannelToUser

        private void addChannelToUser(java.lang.String user,
                              java.lang.String channel)
        Adds the channel to the list of channels the user is a part of. If the user is new, create a new user and assign it that channel.
        Parameters:
        user - user getting assigned the channel
        channel - channel being assigned to the user

      • channelExists

        private boolean channelExists(java.lang.String channel)
        Searches the channel list to see if the specified channel already exists.
        Parameters:
        channel - Channel being questioned
        Returns:
        true if channel already exists and false if it doesn't

        Searches specified file for the specified key and returns an array of the values assorted with it.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        an array of the values associated with the key
